attributes.action: Change the law to enforce a general election within one month of the resignation of the Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During a general election the people of the United Kingdom vote for a political party led by a particular individual who, upon winning the election, becomes Prime Minister.  It is undemocratic for a Prime Minister to change mid term without allowing the people the opportunity to sanction the change.
